Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh" pr create --title "ğŸ¨ [Issue #7] UI redesign with shadcn/ui and Figma-inspired components" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- âœ… Successfully integrated shadcn/ui component library
- âœ… Created new Hero component with dynamic statistics
- âœ… Redesigned ProtocolCard with enhanced visual hierarchy
- âœ… Created unified SearchFilters component
- âœ… Applied Figma-inspired design system
- âœ… All builds and tests passing

## Changes

### 1. shadcn/ui Setup
- Initialized shadcn/ui with Tailwind v4
- Added components: badge, progress, input, button
- Configured dark theme optimized for DeFi

### 2. New Components
- **Hero.tsx**: Dynamic hero section with real-time stats
- **SearchFilters.tsx**: Unified search and filter interface
- **Updated ProtocolCard.tsx**: 
  - Protocol icons (emojis)
  - Large APY display
  - Safety score progress bar
  - Risk level badges with color coding

### 3. Design Improvements
- Dark theme throughout (bg-black)
- Green accent color (#10b981)
- Card backgrounds: bg-gray-900/50
- Hover effects with green glow
- Responsive design for all screen sizes

### 4. Code Quality
- âœ… TypeScript compilation: No errors
- âœ… npm run build: Successful
- âœ… Excluded figma-reference from TypeScript checking
- âœ… Removed deprecated components (SearchBar, FilterBar)

## Visual Changes
- Modern, professional DeFi aesthetic
- Improved information hierarchy
- Better visual feedback on interactions
- Consistent spacing and typography

## Test Results
- âœ… Development server runs without errors
- âœ… Production build completes successfully
- âœ… All filters and search functionality working
- âœ… Responsive design verified

Fixes #7
EOF
